title: Bocabar
typeOfFood: Lacto, Western, Mediterranean, Salad bar, European, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Restaurant in the Red Brick Building Centre on the outskirts of town. Offers a labelled vegan mezze and has vegan salads at the deli counter. Regular menus include limited veg choices.
streetAddress: The Red Brick Building Centre, Morland Road
